> <OLD>
>
> "Hmm, I wonder... I know there's a control room around here som=
ewhere..
I'm not too good at the technological stuff, but, I used to do a f=
ew things,
like control climate, monitor parameters, that sorta thing. I wo=
nder if we
can gain access into the control box, and bypass everything the =
intruder's
done so far?"
>
> Uproar knew where the control box was, he poin=
ts upwards.
>
> "I know where the box is, but getting to it, that might not=
 be easy."

<NEW>

As Uproar looked up he could indeed see small round door=
 that should lead to
the main control hub that was positioned a few meters =
above the bridge, it
was the =91control box=92 and gaining control of it ma=
y give them control of the
bridge.

=93Well it can=92t be too hard.=94 Leo =
II quipped as he looked around,
=93Maintenance personnel and technicians ar=
e going to need to get to it from
time to time.

Wing Caliber quickly moved=
 over to one of the auxiliary stations. =93Here.=94 He
said as he activated=
 several controls and the door above the bridge slid
open revealing the con=
trol box just a short climb away.

At the same time a female voice said, =
=93One minute forty five seconds until
detonation.=94 The counter on the fr=
ont panel mirrored that count as it
continued to count down towards zero.

=
Leo II straightened as looked at Uproar and Quickstride, =93I know we have =
not
worked together before, do either of you have any technical knowledge?=
=94 Leo
was a leader in crisis as he watched the world he believed in presu=
mably
coming to an end. The destruction of the Ark would not only end their=
 lives,
but the destruction of Optimus Prime and Megatron would forever dis=
rupt the
time stream destrying ALL of them.

> <OLD>
>
> Percepro Ran towar=
ds Rodimus and soon he reach him "Nothing yet"said coldy

> while he tried =
to sense something

<NEW>

Legacy quickly moved with Pereptor, easily keepi=
ng up with the blind
Predacon, leading him in the correct directions. As th=
e two approached
Rodimus=92 position they could both see the red beams of t=
he two=92s targeting
sensors before they actually came into view.

As Perce=
ptor came around the corner Rodimus=92 and Ramulus pointed their
weapons at=
 him for a moment and then stopped. Rodimus smiled sheepishly,
=93Sorry Per=
ceptor, its old habit.=94 Lowering their weapons Rodimus continued,
=93I ta=
ke it that Nightlight is out of danger?=94

As Rodimus talked Ramulus conti=
nued to look around, peering down around the
corner. =93I don=92t like this=
, something is wrong.=94

=93I agree.=94 Rodimus said as he got a call from=
 Tuscon . . .

> <OLD>
>
> "Tucson Prime to Rodimus Prime, over. As soon as=
 I am close enough to the
ark, I am going to attempt a short range sonar di=
sruption intercept of the
Ark's systems. Hopefully this will cause enough o=
f a falter, for us to
regain control of the system via an interruption of f=
requencies. Tell -
Legacy to be ready to intercept the mainframe on my mark=
. Tucson Prime out."

<NEW>

=93Understood.=94 Came Rodimus=92 reply. His v=
oice was quiet and firm. =93What ever
you do, do it quickly. I have Legacy =
with me right now, we will be ready.=94

Rodimus turned to Legacy, =93I am =
not sure exactly how Tuscon plans to
overload these systems, they were desi=
gned to hold off the Predacon army,
but hopefully he has a plan.=94

Legacy=
 nodded, =93Perhaps. I will be ready in either case.=94

Rodimus grunted as=
 he and Ramulus brought their weapons to full power. =93In
any case, be rea=
dy for anything.=94 Rodius began to lead the way down the
hall. =93Now we h=
ave to get to one of the control rooms.=94

Ramulus pointed to a nearby doo=
r, =93There.=94 He said.

As they made thier way over another call came fro=
m Tuscon . . .

> <OLD>
>
> " Rodimus, as soon as we can regain control of =
the Ark, and the enemy
> is subdued, I'd like everyone to meet in the contr=
ol room, so we can
figure
> out how to deal with the intruder in an apropri=
ate manner. I'd like
everyone's
> imput as how to go about it. After all, h=
e just didn't anger me, he
angered
> and endangered everyone. "

<NEW>

"Go=
tcha." Rodimus said as he made his way over towards the control room. He
co=
uld not help but feel the slightest bit of fear and apprehension as he
soug=
ht to defeat this enemy and implement this plan of Tuscon's. Every
moment t=
hat he was trying to get into the control room was a moment that he
was lea=
ving Elita unguarded.

> <OLD>
>
> =93We jsut arrived=94said the Predacon l=
eader while he set in a place where he
could
> see the Maximal Group withou=
t been seen or detected, then he sent his
coordinates
> to Blackrazor =93Be=
 ready to left the base... I=92ll cover you=94

<NEW>

=93I will be ready m=
omentarily.=94 Blackrazor said, his voice as quiet as a
whisper. =93I just =
need a little insurance.=94

> <OLD>
>
> Elita kept her eyes and ears sensi=
ng around her, she must protect Lord
> Elder now and whoever were close wou=
ld hurt him.

<NEW>

Interestingly enough the was a sound that Elita could =
hear, the sound of a
voice, a quiet one, one that said, =93. . . need a lit=
tle insurance.=94

Then a dark figure seemed to almost materialize out of t=
hin air. The figured
looked one of the old seekers, maybe Skywarp, although=
 he was far darker.
The muzzle of his blaster aimed right at Elita as he lo=
oked right at her
hiding spot, =93Come on out.=94 he said in an evil rasp. =
=93I believe I have found
my key out of here. YOU.=94

(TAG)

Preston

--bcaec53f8f87eb5629049d1edd3c
